LanguageData.BurnedTree.label: burned tree
LanguageData.BurnedTree.description: A burned tree. Yields no usable wood.
LanguageData.Plant_Ambrosia.label: ambrosia bush
LanguageData.Plant_Ambrosia.description: A rarely-sprouting bush which yields the ambrosia fruit. Ambrosia is pleasurable to eat and produces a slightly addictive chemical warmth effect.
